role: Developed various websites and web-based systems with the LAMP stack. From UI/UX drafting, project file system designing, Database design up to configuring Apache servers on deployment. Some notable technologies, frameworks and applications used are: REST APIs, Object Oriented Programming, DRY, Woocommerce API, MVCL design, SEO Fundamentals, Wordpress and Opencart.
Managed nginx webservers and maintained various wordpress created websites using Elementor and DIVI.
Collaborated with fellow interns using GIT and helped further the development of an internal web-based system written in Laravel and Vue.js.

Aside from working full time in the corporate world, I’ve become a freelance developer and served clients such as Canvasspoint, Bigtime Empire, Technomed and undergraduate Masteral Professors. Also proficient on various media design software, I’ve also catered minor graphic designing and video editing for undergraduate college students
